custom_fields.key_topics: The goal of this course is to recognize and be aware that mindsets are variable and can be altered; understanding and mindfulness can be self-induced with the right philosophy and thought process. Motivational philosophy in which human perception of items and occurrences is discovered/discussed. Themes will vary from week to week (roughly), covering topics to do with psychology, philosophy, and ethics.
custom_fields.assessment_structure: The final course grade will be calculated using the following categories: Participation/Attendance; Assignments; Mid-term; Final Project.
custom_fields.goals: This course seeks to develop a relaxed mindset through philosophy, and a base of critical thinking by recognizing realities and putting oneself in other peoples shoes, developing a sense of mindfulness and awareness of the little things around us. We welcome you in this way to a tranquil perspective.
custom_fields.relevance: A break from a systematic way of thinking by spending time discovering people's perspectives; a modern approach to daily struggles will be addressed during this course.
custom_fields.learning_resources: Readings and assignments will be posted on Canvas.
